Class Reviews

java.lang.Object
model.Reviews
public class Reviews extends Object
In-memory manager for Review objects with backing persistence via DatabaseHelper.

The class caches reviews in-memory and exposes CRUD and search operations. It also handles basic permission checks for update/delete: authors may edit/delete their own review; privileged users (staff/admin) may operate on any review.

On construction the manager loads existing reviews from the database so that callers can operate on the cached set.

Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Result create(int userId, int answerId, String author, String content)
      Create and persist a new review.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the review author
      answerId - id of the answer being reviewed
      author - author display name
      content - review body
      Returns:
      Result indicating success or failure (with message and payload)

    • read

      public Review read(int reviewId)
      Read a single review by id from the in-memory cache.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - id of the review
      Returns:
      Review or null if not found

      Return reviews attached to a specific answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - answer id
      Returns:
      list of reviews for that answer

    • update

      public Result update(int reviewId, int answerId, User currUser, String content)
      Update the review content (and persist). Permission checks (author vs privileged) may be applied by the caller; this method verifies the parent answer exists first.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - id of review to update
      answerId - id of parent answer (verified against DB)
      currUser - current user performing the update (may be used for permission checks)
      content - new content (if non-null will replace current)
      Returns:
      Result indicating success or failure

    • delete

      public Result delete(int reviewId, User user)
      Delete a review if the user is either the author or privileged.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - id of the review to delete
      user - the user requesting deletion (used for permission check)
      Returns:
      Result indicating success or failure

    • search

      public List<Review> search(int answerId, String keyword, Integer minRating)
      Search reviews for a specific answer, optional keyword, and minimum average rating.
      Parameters:
      answerId - id of the answer to search reviews for
      keyword - optional keyword matched against author or content (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      list of matching reviews

    • search

      public List<Review> search(String keyword, String author, Integer minRating)
      Search reviews across all answers by keyword, author and optional min rating.
      Parameters:
      keyword - keyword to search in author/content
      author - optional author substring
      Returns:
      matching reviews
